Software Construction

API Design By: Rajan Shah

API design refers to the process of developing application programming interfaces that expose data and application functionality for use by developers and users.

Software Design

Software Interface Design By: Subhodip Ray

User interface (UI) design refers to the process which designers use to build interfaces in software devices, focusing on style.

Software Testing

Writing Unit Tests By: Jayapriya Pazhani

Software testing is an investigation conducted to provide stakeholders with information about the quality of the software product or service under test.

Software Requirements

Software Requirements Elicitation By: Dinesh Sesetti

Requirements Elicitation refers to the practice of researching and discovering the requirements of a system from stakeholders.

Software Quality

Product and Process Assurance By: Shubham Sagar

SQA is a process that assures all software engineering processes, activities and work are monitored and comply to the defined standards.

Software Configuration Management

Configuration Management & Support By: R V Pavan Kumar Reddy

Software Configuration Management is the task of controlling and tracking changes in the software engineering process.

Software Process & Life-Cycle

Software Development Life Cycle Implementation By: Harshkumar Raval

SDLC is a framework that defines the sequence of intricate steps that are involved in development of software at each phase.

Software Maintenance Planning

Software Maintenance By: Shubham Ranadive

Software Maintenance is a part of SDLC with the purpose to modify and update software after delivery to improve performance.
